no.woact.mikand.ticTacToe.models.utils.pause

Class SwipePause

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
      • no.woact.mikand.ticTacToe.models.utils.pause.SwipePause
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.view.GestureDetector.OnDoubleTapListener, android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener

    public class SwipePause
extends android.view.GestureDetector.SimpleOnGestureListener
    Created by Anders Mikkelsen on 09.02.15. This class controls the pause screen ingame.
    Version:
    09.02.15
    Author:
    anders

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SwipePause(android.app.Activity parent)
      This constructor sets the game to unpaused by default, sets an activity as parent as supplied by the caller and generates a pauseFragment.

    • Method Detail

      • onFling

        public boolean onFling(android.view.MotionEvent evt1,
                       android.view.MotionEvent evt2,
                       float velocityX,
                       float velocityY)
        This method is called whenever a swipe is detected in Game. It then verifies the direction and wether the game is paused or not and proceeds accordingly.
        Specified by:
        onFling in interface android.view.GestureDetector.OnGestureListener
        Overrides:

        Parameters:

        evt2 - MotionEvent

        velocityY - float
        Returns:
